steps.title: Choose a Campaign
steps.description: Browse through various causes and select the campaign you'd like to support. Every campaign is transparent with clear goals.

steps.title: Make a Donation
steps.description: Contribute securely through our platform. Even the smallest amount can bring life-changing impact to someone in need.

steps.title: See the Impact
steps.description: Track the progress of campaigns you supported and witness the real change your contribution has created.
